title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
text: What's the best Food Buff these days for each class? I.E. For Magiblade is it now the Sandstar Meatroll? What's the best Food Buff these days for each class? I.E. For Magiblade is it now the Sandstar Meatroll? I usually find this question odd, but Which server is European anyway? I started playing on the recommended server, but at first I couldn't even complete the tutorial or create a character. The connection to the server would consistently drop every 8-10 seconds, only to be reestablished. Then I also saw a message in the in-game store saying "unable to retrieve item information" quite regularly. And finally, I noticed significant lag in the city. It felt like the server I created my character on was on the other side of the world. But when I tried creating a character on another server, I couldn't figure out which server I needed to go to. I'm not even sure I can see European servers. Can anyone help?
